vn.uiza.views.overscroll.lib.overscroll

Class VerticalOverScrollBounceEffectDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.uiza.views.overscroll.lib.overscroll.OverScrollBounceEffectDecoratorBase
      • vn.uiza.views.overscroll.lib.overscroll.VerticalOverScrollBounceEffectDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnTouchListener, IOverScrollDecor

    public class VerticalOverScrollBounceEffectDecorator
extends OverScrollBounceEffectDecoratorBase
    A concrete implementation of me.everything.android.ui.overscroll.OverScrollBounceEffectDecoratorBase for a vertical orientation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VerticalOverScrollBounceEffectDecorator

        public VerticalOverScrollBounceEffectDecorator(IOverScrollDecoratorAdapter viewAdapter)
        C'tor, creating the effect with default arguments:
        Touch-drag ratio in 'forward' direction will be set to DEFAULT_TOUCH_DRAG_MOVE_RATIO_FWD.
        Touch-drag ratio in 'backwards' direction will be set to DEFAULT_TOUCH_DRAG_MOVE_RATIO_BCK.
        Deceleration factor (for the bounce-back effect) will be set to DEFAULT_DECELERATE_FACTOR.
        Parameters:
        viewAdapter - The view's encapsulation.

      • VerticalOverScrollBounceEffectDecorator

        public VerticalOverScrollBounceEffectDecorator(IOverScrollDecoratorAdapter viewAdapter,
                                               float touchDragRatioFwd,
                                               float touchDragRatioBck,
                                               float decelerateFactor)
        C'tor, creating the effect with explicit arguments.
        Parameters:
        viewAdapter - The view's encapsulation.
        touchDragRatioFwd - Ratio of touch distance to actual drag distance when in 'forward' direction.
        touchDragRatioBck - Ratio of touch distance to actual drag distance when in 'backward' direction (opposite to initial one).
        decelerateFactor - Deceleration factor used when decelerating the motion to create the bounce-back effect.
